title: Advanced Bot tests LIVE in Normals

replies.body: April Fools joke is my best guess. {{champion:7}}
I'm gonna call it.  Riot replaces our names with "[Champion] Bot" in game.
So what about Annie Bot (Jared)?

Annie Bot is actually an experiment gone wrong from Riot's original attempt at developing advanced bots. They used a machine learning algorithm so they could learn to play like real humans, but the computer became too intelligent and ended up discovering the human players actually play in ranked and if they are good they even stream, so Annie Bot began doing that and Riot lost control over the code.

> Sorry did you say they "lost control" over their own code. I dont see how professional businesses could truly lose any control over their own code. AI's cant really outsmart people 100%

I bet you're a blast at parties.
You were right. Legit best April Fool's yet Riot (hmm, maybe all chat should be disabled permanently, seemed to quell the rage/tilt-fest a bit).
If it's just other people, how come the other team, in the post game lobby claimed to have also lost?
Are we still gonna get the icon though? xD

That makes sense, actually...
Though the bots do need to be updated a bit.
My Calendar is telling me no... But my body... My body is telling me Yeeeeaaahhhh!
Signed in to upvote. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I smell black magic... {{champion:67}}
{{champion:236}} {{champion:245}}
{{champion:56}}
{{champion:62}} ?
{{champion:161}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:45}}
{{champion:45}}
{{champion:63}} <<<<< cant forget him tho. He's a BRUNT chicken nugget
there was a vayne on my team for my first "bot" game
It passes the [Turing Test](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turing_test) before it even launches, since most players already think their teammates are as dumb as beginner bots.
How many League players does it take to change a lightbulb?  All of them!  One to do it and the rest to say how they coulda done it better because they're Challenger smurfs!
I guess you could say they are all Fakers.
I got a free skin because someone thought I was Annie bot XD
I for one welcome our new robot overlords
{{champion:164}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:112}} Definitely Viktor
But do they flame tho.
Only the {{champion:68}} -Bot
or {{champion:63}} -Bot
or the {{champion:1}} Bot oh wait...
Or the {{champion:157}} Bot

"what happened to you Jared? You used to be so positive"

-imaqtpie
{{champion:54}} -bot and {{champion:150}} -bot in this game i had did. They flashed their masteries and would dance and taunt
Advanced personalities
I just reported all 5 people on the enemy team for cheating. G_G {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Scripts activated . . . bleep boop! The time of man has come to an end.{{champion:53}} 

As the glow turns red you hear in the background, "I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that." ~Hal9000
Nothing is more tilting than a bot taunting over your dead body
These bots suck!  They're a **huge** downgrade from the bots currently in the game.

bOI THEY PRANKED ME
I thought the enemy team was some dumb bots and just fooled around. To later find out that they're real people with their names changed
YOU'RE SO FUNNY RIOT HAHA, YOU GUYS ARE A REAL "RIOT"
wait, so are these like draft games?

Yes, draft is included. A friend suggested that riot might be "claiming" your opponents are bots when they are really not (while removing communication between the two teams) which would make it a really funny april fools joke

APRIL FOOLS! There labeled as bots, but im pretty sure there real players with way higher elo. They still make human mistakes. I have to make sure to put lotion on my butthole for the stretch marks. These guys are good. Good job riot! took me about 2 matches to figure it out!
The mmr of the match isn't changed that is just normal matchmaking {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
jesus Christ these bots are actually kind of hard, took 45 minutes to defeat them -__-
Jokes on you riot I have all chat disabled normally, so to me I just see summoners with the name (champion name) bot

So I just had a match were the enemies were named "champ" bot, and my team tried all chat to talk, but no response. Game ended, we lost, and the end game lobby were real people. I was confused all game, and long story short, Riot are jerks with this april fools joke. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
why the hell are these bots so damn broken I'm only silver and they doing lcs level plays
They've learned from many thousands of games over the last 15hours.

I met 2 the bots two times now, one time is really weird, three people at bot, another one is really skillful, which is always have outplayed. I have a really good suggestion that there is one little shortcoming: once they can not kill the enemy in one combo, they won't fight even though their enemy is way more weak. Furthermore ,there is one more little bug when I was playing. One of the bots actually has a bug or missing code in there which is a string. That bot played with me as yi. Hope you guys can fix it! I really like this bot test. Hope we can meet new mode quicker.
